LoreBookDefinition.BookDescription: A vile, profane book, mainly used to demonstrate some features of LoreBooks.
LoreBookDefinition.BookTitlePageContent: This book contains information on the features available to modders. LoreBooks has limited support for dynamic varibles in the text Character Name : {0} HP ({1} / {2}) STAMINA ({3} / {4}) Scene Name {5}

PageContent.TextContent: Events You can trigger events on certain actions, such as applying a status effect to the character opening the book. (you are now bleeding, go to the next page).

Bleeding Fixed! You can only read this book while you have more than zero Current Mana. Or anything you choose, such as quest completion, items owned, or area the player is in. You can also press the default "Use" key (Space on PC) with certain books! Try it on this page.
